CustomField.description: Used in runrate calculation for forecasting.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Month(TODAY()), 1, fmlDays__c, 2, fmlDays__c + 31, 3, fmlDays__c + 60, 4, fmlDays__c, 5, fmlDays__c +30, 6, fmlDays__c + 61, 7, fmlDays__c, 8, fmlDays__c + 31, 9, fmlDays__c + 61, 10, fmlDays__c, 11, fmlDays__c + 31, 12, fmlDays__c + 61, 0)
CustomField.label: Days Quarter
